description: This is a React component for a login page that handles user authentication, including fetching CSRF tokens, session checking, and submitting login credentials. It manages user input state, communicates with backend endpoints, and redirects upon successful login.

methods.name: checkSession
methods.description: Asynchronously checks if a user session is already authenticated by querying the backend session endpoint. Redirects to home page if authenticated.

methods.name: fetchCsrf
methods.description: Fetches CSRF token from backend and stores it in component state.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles login form submission, sending credentials and CSRF token to backend, managing loading and error states, and redirecting upon success.
